name: Strange girl beside
description:
Why is a frustrated teenager always behind closed doors?
Why do cohabitation girls always infiltrate into the middle of the night?
What kind of sparks will boys and girls scream?
In the visual novel "Strange girl beside"


It is about the experience of a lonely young man in just a few days.
When the author is unemployed all year long,
Strange delusions in the brain.
Hope to have players resonate.
